landingPage.intro: Programming is not just about writing code; it's also about how effectively you interact with your computer. Programming education often overlooks the importance of the 'development environment,' leading to frustration for many students. The 'development environment' encompasses all the tools needed for writing and running programs, which often require command-line instructions. Most programming environments are not Windows or Mac OS, but Linux. Linux Odyssey is an online interactive teaching website designed for this purpose.

beginner.title: Beginner-Friendly
beginner.description: We understand that setting up and using development tools can be a major hurdle for beginners. Learners can connect to a real Linux environment through their browser without installing any software.

gamified.title: Gamified Learning Experience
gamified.description: Linux Odyssey combines the fun of gaming with the practicality of learning. Through carefully designed game levels, learners can tackle challenges and solve puzzles while mastering Linux commands.

real_experience.title: Real Linux Experience
real_experience.description: Linux Odyssey offers not just theoretical knowledge but real operational experience. Every command is executed in a real Linux environment, allowing learners to truly delve into the world of software development.

landingPage.startGame: Get your keyboard ready and start your Linux adventure with us!

team.title: Team Introduction
team.description: National Taipei University of Technology, Department of Intelligent Automation Engineering, 2nd Cohort

awards.title: Awards and Recognition
awards.description: University Information Application Service Innovation Competition, Titan Agile Development Special Award, 2nd Place

playerFeedback.title: Player Feedback
feedbacks: It's very fun, like a puzzle game.
I never knew about free software, thank you.
It's quite fun and makes programming enjoyable.
I used to dislike computer classes, but now I like them a bit more.
The program is very beginner-friendly and I learned a lot.
It feels well-made, very clear and easy to understand, and the level design is very thoughtful.

This experience was very interesting. I got to experience programming that I couldn't before. The seniors were very helpful and explained everything thoroughly. I hope to participate in such activities again in the future.
I used to think programming was difficult, but now I find it interesting.
I used to think programming was something I wouldn't encounter in my life and that it was very difficult. But after this course, I find programming more approachable.
